EventHandlers
Class StageController.StageControllerThread

java.lang.Object

      EventHandlers.StageController.StageControllerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
StageController
private class StageController.StageControllerThread
extends java.lang.Thread

An instance of this class takes care of running the simulation. The thread ends when the paused value is set to true.

Constructor Detail

StageController.StageControllerThread

public StageController.StageControllerThread()
The constructor doesn't do anything.

Method Detail

isSimulationComplete

private Country isSimulationComplete()
This method returns the Country that won the war if the simulation has ended. The method returns null if there is no country that has conquered the entire map yet.

Returns:
Returns true if the simulation has finished. That is, is there a country that owns all of the states?

run

public void run()
This is the method that calls the four stages for each country in a round robin fashion. After each round, it checks to see if the simulation has ended.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread
